verses.text: \w It|strong="H1121"\w* \w has|strong="H1121"\w* come \w to|strong="H1121"\w* our ears, O God, our fathers \w have|strong="H1121"\w* given us \w the|strong="H1121"\w* story, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* works which you did \w in|strong="H1121"\w* their days, \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* times,

Uprooting \w the|strong="H8085"\w* nations \w with|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* hand, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* planting \w our|strong="H0430"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* place; cutting down \w the|strong="H8085"\w* nations, \w but|strong="H8085"\w* increasing \w the|strong="H8085"\w* growth \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* did not \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* land theirs \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* swords, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w it|strong="H7971"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* not \w their|strong="H7971"\w* \w arms|strong="H3027"\w* \w which|strong="H1471"\w* kept \w them|strong="H7971"\w* safe; \w but|strong="H0859"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* right \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* \w arm|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* light \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* face, \w because|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w had|strong="H3027"\w* pleasure \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* King \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*; ordering \w salvation|strong="H3467"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Jacob.

Through \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* we overcome \w our|strong="H0430"\w* haters; \w by|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H6680"\w* name \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w they|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* crushed under \w our|strong="H0430"\w* feet \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* violent \w against|strong="H3290"\w* us.

\w I|strong="H6965"\w* \w will|strong="H8034"\w* not put faith \w in|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H6965"\w* bow, \w my|strong="H6965"\w* sword \w will|strong="H8034"\w* not \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H6965"\w* salvation.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H2719"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0982"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* saviour \w from|strong="H3808"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H2719"\w* \w against|strong="H2719"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w have|strong="H0982"\w* \w put|strong="H0982"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* shame \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* hate \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Our|strong="H3588"\w* pride \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3588"\w* God \w at|strong="H0954"\w* \w all|strong="H0954"\w* times, \w to|strong="H0954"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* name \w we|strong="H3588"\w* give \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever. (Selah.)

\w But|strong="H3117"\w* \w now|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* sent \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* put \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* shame; \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* not go \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* armies.

Because \w of|strong="H6635"\w* this we \w are|strong="H0637"\w* turned \w back|strong="H3318"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* attacker: those \w who|strong="H6635"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* hate \w for|strong="H6635"\w* us \w take|strong="H3318"\w* \w our|strong="H3318"\w* goods \w for|strong="H6635"\w* themselves.

\w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H8130"\w* \w made|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w like|strong="H7725"\w* sheep which are \w taken|strong="H8154"\w* \w for|strong="H4480"\w* meat; \w we|strong="H7725"\w* are \w put|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* flight \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* nations.

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* go \w for|strong="H5414"\w* nothing; \w your|strong="H5414"\w* wealth \w is|strong="H3978"\w* not increased \w by|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* price.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* made \w us|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* looked down \w on|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w our|strong="H5971"\w* neighbours, we \w are|strong="H3808"\w* laughed \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H1952"\w* shamed \w by|strong="H3808"\w* those \w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3808"\w* round about \w us|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Our|strong="H7760"\w* name is \w a|strong="H7760"\w* word \w of|strong="H2781"\w* \w shame|strong="H2781"\w* \w among|strong="H2781"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* nations, \w a|strong="H7760"\w* sign for \w the|strong="H7760"\w* shaking \w of|strong="H2781"\w* heads \w among|strong="H2781"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* peoples.

\w My|strong="H7760"\w* downfall \w is|strong="H7218"\w* ever before \w me|strong="H7760"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* am covered \w with|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* shame \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* face;

\w Because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* says sharp \w and|strong="H3117"\w* bitter words; \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hater \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* instrument \w of|strong="H3117"\w* punishment.

All this has come \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w*, but still we have kept \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H6963"\w* \w our|strong="H6440"\w* memory; \w and|strong="H6963"\w* we have not been false \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* word.

\w Our|strong="H3605"\w* hearts \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w gone|strong="H0935"\w* \w back|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* steps \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* turned \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H2063"\w*;

Though \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H5186"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* crushed \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* place \w of|strong="H4480"\w* jackals, though we \w are|strong="H0734"\w* covered \w with|strong="H3820"\w* darkest shade.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* God \w has|strong="H3588"\w* gone \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* minds, \w or|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* hands \w have|strong="H3588"\w* been stretched \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* strange god,

\w Will|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w make|strong="H8034"\w* search \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*? \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* sees \w the|strong="H0518"\w* secrets \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* heart.

\w Truly|strong="H3588"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* put \w to|strong="H3820"\w* death every day; \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* numbered \w like|strong="H3808"\w* sheep \w for|strong="H3588"\w* destruction.

\w Why|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* sleeping, O Lord? awake! \w and|strong="H3117"\w* come \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* help, \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* give \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H4100"\w* face covered, \w and|strong="H3462"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* give \w no|strong="H0408"\w* thought \w to|strong="H0136"\w* \w our|strong="H0136"\w* trouble \w and|strong="H3462"\w* \w our|strong="H0136"\w* cruel fate?

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w our|strong="H6440"\w* souls \w are|strong="H4100"\w* crushed \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* dust: \w our|strong="H6440"\w* bodies \w are|strong="H4100"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H4100"\w* \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth.

Up! \w and|strong="H0776"\w* come \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* help, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* give \w us|strong="H3588"\w* salvation \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* mercy.
